body_html:
@goodlux Oh I see what you meant. Could you try things like \big, \bigg, \Bigg, etc. to make it look nicer? It's fine if it looks a bit worse as the original. Not a deal breaker.

About the kernel_size etc. You changed them to math mode so the escape char is needed. I think if you keep the \text wrapper it should still work.
body_text:
@goodlux  Oh I see what you meant. Could you try things like \big, \bigg, \Bigg, etc. to make it look nicer? It's fine if it looks a bit worse as the original. Not a deal breaker.
About the kernel_size etc. You changed them to math mode so the escape char is needed. I think if you keep the \text wrapper it should still work.
body:
@goodlux  Oh I see what you meant. Could you try things like `\big, \bigg, \Bigg, etc.` to make it look nicer? It's fine if it looks a bit worse as the original. Not a deal breaker.

About the `kernel_size` etc. You changed them to math mode so the escape char is needed. I think if you keep the `\text` wrapper it should still work.
